text: Pierre Joseph Auguste Messmer (; 20 March 191629 August 2007) was a French Gaullist politician. He was Minister of Armies under Charles de Gaulle from 1960 to 1969 and then as Prime Minister under Georges Pompidou from 1972 to 1974.Thomas Ferenczi, Le gaulliste Pierre Messmer est mort , Le Monde, 29 August 2007 ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Prime ministers of France Category:Politicians from ÃŽle-de-France Category:People from Val-de-Marne
title: Pierre Messmer
